task.title: Adding Zoom to Canvas Courses
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to add the Zoom integration to each Canvas course you want to use with Zoom.

step.cmd: In the same browser, log into canvas.umn.edu
Select the course you would like to add Zoom to.
In the course navigation menu on the left-hand side of the screen, select Settings.
In the list of menu options, select the correct instance of Zoom for your account:

ul.li: Zoom if you are NOT in the HCC.

li.p: Zoom for BAA if you are in the HCC

NOTE: Students whose BAA status differs from the instructor's will not be able to use the Zoom integration in Canvas for that particular course. We therefore recommend posting the class Zoom meeting link in a public area of the Canvas course in addition to scheduling a meeting directly within the Zoom integration in Canvas to accommodate the students with a different BAA status.

ul.li: Select Enable to move Zoom into your Navigation menu.

step.cmd: At the bottom of the page, select Save. Zoom now appears in the course navigation menu.
When you access Zoom for the first time through the course navigation menu, you will need to select the Authorize option in order to proceed.
